evaluation: This cluster of articles provides a highly continuous and developmental narrative tracking the 2025 Formula One World Championship across three key race weekends: Azerbaijan (September), Singapore (early October), and the United States (mid-October). The main topic revolves around the intense internal rivalry between McLaren teammates Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri for the drivers' title, and the resurgence of Max Verstappen as a dominant contender. The articles chronologically detail qualifying, sprint races, race outcomes, and the direct aftermath, including driver clashes and championship implications. All content is informative and relevant, building a cohesive and synthesizable story of the evolving F1 season. No articles were deemed noisy or irrelevant.
